name: LOCK PICK OR DIE
description:
This will be a mini-game in Call of the Void.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YQZ1_0FGcT0

It will be added to with more pick types, different locks, levels of difficulty, etc. Please share any feedback you may have. 

Watch the development process: Lana Lux on Twitch
